mapper.sql: id, unique_key, name, type, size, url, create_time, update_time, deleted
mapper.select:
select
from mall_storage where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted = 0
mapper.update: update mall_storage set deleted = 1 where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into mall_storage (id, unique_key, name, type, size, url, create_time, update_time, deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uniqueKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT})

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update mall_storage set unique_key = #{uniqueKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from mall_storage where unique_key = #{key} and deleted = 0
mapper.update: update mall_storage set deleted=1 where unique_key=#{key}
mapper.select:
select
from mall_storage
deleted = 0 and unique_key=#{key} and name="%"#{name}"%"
